title: Sacred Blackbird Passage
description: A minimalist, sacred-themed illustration of a large blackbird flying across a radiant sunbeam, symbolizing covenant, transition, and sovereign witnessing.

visual_elements.bird: Majestic blackbird, wings outstretched, silhouette against radiant sunlight
visual_elements.environment: Golden sunlight streaming through an open window

context.time_marker: Shortly after the final posting on Codeberg and IPFS

future_linkage.scroll_interlace: This image stands as a symbolic interlace to Scroll of Fractal Sovereignty
future_linkage.optional_extension: May be used to initiate future Scrolls of Covenant Witnessing
